subject: Football
Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Lockouts
Organized Labor
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The hearing on Friday in St. Louis, before the Eighth Circuit, has loomed large in the fight for leverage between N.F.L. players and owners.
